	"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 11; V1981A) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/107.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",

}

</js>

ruleContent.content:
let domain = "."; function addOptions(url, options) { let headers = { Referer: baseUrl.replace(/,[\s\S]+\}/,"") }; if (!url.includes(domain)) { headers.Referer = ""; } options = options || {}; options.headers = Object.assign(options.headers || {}, headers); return options ? `${url},${JSON.stringify(options)}` : url; } function toImg(url, func, options) { let generateImgTag = (u) => ``; let generateHtml = (u, i, t) => typeof func == "function" ? generateImgTag(func(u, i, t)) : generateImgTag(u); return Array.isArray(url) ? url.map(generateHtml).join("\n") : generateHtml(url.toString()); } function load(urls) { for (let url of urls) { let response = java.ajax(url); if (!/exception/.test(response)){ return [response, url]; } } throw "Error: 所有链接下载失败"; } function parseKey(jsUrl) { let jsBaseUrls = [ "https://raw.githubusercontents.com/Xwite/decodeObfuscator/main/", "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Xwite/decodeObfuscator/main/", "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/Xwite/decodeObfuscator@main/" ]; let urls = [ "plugins/common.js", "plugins/manwa.js", "plugins/evalPacker.js", "tools/babel_asttool.js", "tools/config.js", "tools/decode.js", "tools/decodeOb.js", "tools/usefulPlugins.js", ]; let jsBaseUrl = cache.get("decodeObfuscator"); if (!jsBaseUrl) { jsBaseUrl = load(jsBaseUrls)[1]; cache.put("decodeObfuscator", jsBaseUrl); } String.prototype.toAbsUrl = function() { return /^\.\/|^http|^content|^\/sdcard|^\/storage/.test(this) ? this : jsBaseUrl.concat(this); }; function loadJS(urls) { return jsBaseUrl && urls.map(url => script(java.importScript(url.toAbsUrl()))).join("\n") || ""; } function script(content) { return ``; } let html = `${loadJS(urls)}`; let key = JSON.parse(java.webView(html, JSON.parse(source.getVariable())['url'], "keys"))[0]; return key; } if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") { let DEBUG = 0; let origin = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())['url']; let chjs = src.match(/['"](.*?ch.js\?v=(\d+))/); if (DEBUG || (chjs && chjs[2] != 202208132)) { cache.put("manwa_aes_key", parseKey(chjs[1])); } let imgs = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(src) .select(".content-img") .toArray() .map(v => { let dataRsrc = v.attr("data-r-src"); return dataRsrc ? dataRsrc : ""; }) .filter(v => v !== ""); if (DEBUG) { imgs.splice(1); } var result = toImg(imgs, null, { headers: { origin: origin } }); result; // 返回结果 } else { '
'; }
